name: v0.2
body:
After nearly two months of work, I‚Äôm excited to release **ImPlot3D v0.2** üéâ! This update brings new APIs, better interactions, and many bug fixes, all thanks to the incredible contributions and feedback from the community. A huge thank you to everyone who helped shape this release! Special thanks to: - @epezent for the detailed feedback in https://github.com/brenocq/implot3d/issues/24. - @ocornut for featuring ImPlot3D in the [ImGui v1.91.8 release](https://github.com/ocornut/imgui/releases/tag/v1.91.8). - @pthom for the Python bindings in [imgui-bundle](https://pypi.org/project/imgui-bundle/) and [online demo](https://traineq.org/implot_demo/src/implot_demo.html). - @sonoro1234 for the C bindings in [cimplot3d](https://github.com/cimgui/cimplot3d) and Lua bindings in [LuaJIT-ImGui](https://github.com/sonoro1234/LuaJIT-ImGui). - @HeresJ0nny for suggesting new features and setting up the custom ticks API. - @Poooel for adding new ImPlot3D flags (`Invert` and `NoMenus`). - @dimateos for improving .gitignore and actively participating in discussions. - @floooh for the MacOS fixes and GitHub CI. - @Lumengine for fixing Windows compilation issues. - @bratpilz for ensuring compatibility with `IMGUI_DISABLE_OBSOLETE_FUNCTIONS`. ### üöÄ Features - GitHub CI script for Linux/MacOS/Windows by @floooh in https://github.com/brenocq/implot3d/pull/8 - Custom value range for colormaps by @brenocq in https://github.com/brenocq/implot3d/discussions/12 (feature request from @HeresJ0nny)

- [Online demo](https://traineq.org/implot_demo/src/implot_demo.html) by @pthom (discussion https://github.com/brenocq/implot3d/discussions/25) - Plane context menu by @brenocq in https://github.com/brenocq/implot3d/discussions/29 (feedback from @epezent in https://github.com/brenocq/implot3d/issues/24)

- Weight cursor position when zooming by @brenocq in https://github.com/brenocq/implot3d/discussions/30 (feedback from @epezent in https://github.com/brenocq/implot3d/issues/24)

- Add clipping flag to plot context menu by @brenocq in https://github.com/brenocq/implot3d/discussions/31 (feedback from @epezent in https://github.com/brenocq/implot3d/issues/24)

- New `ImPlot3DAxisFlags_Invert` and `ImPlot3DFlags_NoMenus` flags by @Poooel in https://github.com/brenocq/implot3d/pull/40

- Bindings to other languages - **Python**: [imgui-bundle](https://pypi.org/project/imgui-bundle/) thanks to @pthom (discussion https://github.com/brenocq/implot3d/discussions/45) - **C**: [cimplot3d](https://github.com/cimgui/cimplot3d) thanks to @sonoro1234 (discussion https://github.com/brenocq/implot3d/discussions/52) - **Lua**: [LuaJIT-ImGui](https://github.com/sonoro1234/LuaJIT-ImGui) thanks to @sonoro1234 (discussion https://github.com/brenocq/implot3d/discussions/52) - Box scaling (custom aspect ratios) by @brenocq in https://github.com/brenocq/implot3d/pull/46 (feedback from @epezent in https://github.com/brenocq/implot3d/issues/24)

- Add SetupAxisTicks for configuring custom ticks by @HeresJ0nny in https://github.com/brenocq/implot3d/pull/55

- API to set current rotation and initial rotation by @brenocq in https://github.com/brenocq/implot3d/pull/61

### üêõ Bug fixes | üõ†Ô∏è Chores - Compression of README GIFs by @gezeta-id and @brenocq in https://github.com/brenocq/implot3d/issues/6 - Fix example build and run on MacOS by @floooh in https://github.com/brenocq/implot3d/pull/7 - Fix Windows compilation errors by @Lumengine in https://github.com/brenocq/implot3d/pull/11. @michaelkamau, @floooh, and @khurramjaved96 also reported this bug in https://github.com/brenocq/implot3d/issues/4, https://github.com/brenocq/implot3d/issues/5, and https://github.com/brenocq/implot3d/pull/10 - README feature tracking & progress overview by @brenocq in https://github.com/brenocq/implot3d/discussions/23

- Fix mouse position flag not working by @brenocq in https://github.com/brenocq/implot3d/discussions/31 - Fix compatability with `IMGUI_DISABLE_OBSOLETE_FUNCTIONS` by @bratpilz in https://github.com/brenocq/implot3d/pull/42 - Minor warning fix by @pthom in https://github.com/brenocq/implot3d/pull/43 - Warning fixes by @brenocq in https://github.com/brenocq/implot3d/pull/53 - Fix min/max lock & axis transformation by @brenocq in https://github.com/brenocq/implot3d/pull/54 - Add common IDE cache folders to gitignored by @dimateos in https://github.com/brenocq/implot3d/pull/56 - Display avatars in discussion cards by @brenocq in https://github.com/brenocq/implot3d/pull/59 - Fix auto fit giggle by @brenocq in https://github.com/brenocq/implot3d/pull/60 (reported by @dimateos in https://github.com/brenocq/implot3d/issues/47) - Fix `ImGuiColorEditFlags_AlphaPreview` disappearing after imgui 19173 by @sonoro1234 in https://github.com/brenocq/implot3d/pull/64 ### üéâ New Contributors * @floooh made their first contribution in https://github.com/brenocq/implot3d/pull/8 * @Lumengine made their first contribution in https://github.com/brenocq/implot3d/pull/11 * @Poooel made their first contribution in https://github.com/brenocq/implot3d/pull/40 * @bratpilz made their first contribution in https://github.com/brenocq/implot3d/pull/42 * @pthom made their first contribution in https://github.com/brenocq/implot3d/pull/43 * @HeresJ0nny made their first contribution in https://github.com/brenocq/implot3d/pull/55 * @dimateos made their first contribution in https://github.com/brenocq/implot3d/pull/56 * @sonoro1234 made their first contribution in https://github.com/brenocq/implot3d/pull/64 **Full Changelog**: https://github.com/brenocq/implot3d/compare/v0.1...v0.2

name: v0.1
body: I‚Äôm thrilled to share the v0.1 release of ImPlot3D! üéâ This is the very first public version of ImPlot3D, and it‚Äôs fresh out of the oven! While it already supports interactive 3D plotting, this release is just the beginning. ### üöÄ Features - Core 3D Plotting Functions: - `PlotScatter`: Plot individual 3D points. - `PlotLine`: Draw lines in 3D space. - `PlotTriangle`: Render triangles with fill support. - `PlotQuad`: Render quads (two triangles) for surfaces. - `PlotSurface`: Plot structured surfaces with X/Y grids. - `PlotMesh`: Display custom meshes using vertices and indices. - `PlotText`: Annotate your 3D plots with centered text labels. - Interactivity: - Rotate, pan, and zoom plots using the mouse or touchpad. - Reset the camera view with double-click interactions. - Smooth camera rotation animations. - Customization: - Control line styles, colors, and marker styles. - Apply colormaps to surfaces, lines, and markers. - Flexible axis setup with SetupAxes and SetupAxesLimits. ### ‚ö†Ô∏è Your Feedback Matters! This is **v0.1**, the very first step for ImPlot3D, and it‚Äôs far from perfect. Your input will shape its future! Whether you find bugs üêû, think of missing features üí°, or create something amazing with it üé® ‚Äî I want to hear from you. - üêû Spotted a bug? [Open an issue](https://github.com/brenocq/implot3d/issues/new) and let‚Äôs squash it. - üí° Need something new? [Share your ideas](https://github.com/brenocq/implot3d/discussions/categories/features-and-improvements) for features or improvements. - üé® Built something cool? Expose it in our [Gallery](https://github.com/brenocq/implot3d/discussions/3)! Your feedback will help refine and grow ImPlot3D into the tool it‚Äôs meant to be. Let‚Äôs build this together! üöÄ
